_header: Christ give us grace to love well Holy Church
_description: Love Holy Church and its Priests — two 12-line stanzas, ababcdcdcdcd, followed by five 8-line stanzas, abababab

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Crist ȝiue vs grace to loue wel holi chirchOr elles certes we
                    don riht nouht…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Ihesu bring vs and socoureOut of þis world whon we schal
                    go

BLAdd22283.First Lines:
Crist ȝeue vs grace to loue wel holichirchOr elles certes we
                    don riht nouht…
BLAdd22283.Last Lines:
…Ihesu bryng vs and socoureOut of þis world whon we schal
                    go
